duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide learning expertise and coaching across all customer experience departments.
Develop frameworks to support and accelerate employee competence around skills, behaviors, systems, and processes.
Design and maintain training tools and resources, ensuring they are up to date and support the development of new training sessions and e-learning modules.
Collaborate with customer experience community and business partners to ensure consistency of programs and alignment with business strategy.
Manage internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve learning and training objectives.
Train, coach, mentor, and develop colleagues across the customer experience community to higher levels of performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Learning and Development, Human Resources, or a related field (Master's preferred)
